OrgName.entry: AGENCY FOR CULTURE AND CHANGE MANAGEMENT (ACCM)

Desc.entry: Aims to bring together people and groups from different cultures to uphold and develop positive aspects of all cultures and tackle any ignorance about different people's beliefs. Main current focus is to raise awareness of health, social, legal and human rights violation in practices such as female genital mutilation, forced arranged marriages and honour violence. Works with parents to increase awareness of potential harm to children and with children, to make them aware of their rights. Also works with statutory agencies and professionals to ensure they are fully aware of the issues. Company limited by guarantee no 3603632.

Langs.entry: Arabic, French, Luganda, Punjabi, Somali, Swahili,

Pubs.entry: Leaflets; Videos; DVDs; Reports; Annual Report
